name: FITDNA_CPT
title: FIT DNA_CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for FIT DNA.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute FIT DNA for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: FIT DNA for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: FIT DNA Codes that constitute the Clinical Grouping Lab for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Oncology (colorectal) screening, quantitative real-time target and signal amplification of 10 DNA markers (KRAS mutations, promoter methylation of NDRG4 and BMP3) and fecal hemoglobin, utilizing stool, algorithm reported as a positive or negative result

contains.display: Oncology (colorectal) screening, quantitative real-time target and signal amplification of 10 DNA markers (KRAS mutations, promoter methylation of NDRG4 and BMP3) and fecal hemoglobin, utilizing stool, algorithm reported as a positive or negative result
